body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support team. My name is Emily Parker and I represent CleanStay Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Rachel Young.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello Rachel. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm experiencing issues with noisy neighbors in my hotel room.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Rachel. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your room number and the floor you are on?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm on room two one four and the third floor.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rachel. We take noise disturbances seriously and will address this matter promptly. Is there anything else I can help you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Rachel. We appreciate your cooperation. Have a pleasant stay and do not hesitate to contact us again if needed. Goodbye.
